definition: to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate

pinyin: jie4 zhi4 fang3 wen4 kong4 zhi4
jie4 zhi4 fang3 wen4 kong4 zhi4 ceng2

definition: to make an official visit (often abroad)

pinyin: mei2 ti3 fang3 wen4 kong4 zhi4

sentences.english: The type of an access intent can be either read or update.
sentences.chinese: 訪問意圖的類型可以是讀取或是更新。
他們正在上海蔘觀訪問。

sentences.english: Each plug-in has access to information about a personâ ™s current location whereabouts. The location information includes
sentences.chinese: 各插件都可訪問關於某人當前位置所在的信息。

sentences.english: The Actavis Group hf. respects the privacy of the visitors to this website.
sentences.chinese: 阿特維斯集團尊重本網站訪問者的隱私。

sentences.english: We need physical access to a computer with a keyboard hooked directly to it.
sentences.chinese: 需要用直接連接到計算機上的鍵盤來物理訪問計算機。

sentences.english: This, of course, is the bare minimum and restricts only administrative access.
sentences.chinese: 這當然是最小設置，僅僅限制管理訪問權限。

sentences.english: This link represents the network access that the server provides to the virtual system.
sentences.chinese: 該鏈接代表了服務器提供給虛擬機系統的網絡訪問。

sentences.english: Or you can have a form to collect visitors' comments about your site.
sentences.chinese: 或者可以創建表格收集訪問者對網站的評論。

sentences.english: This is my third visit in just over two years as Secretary-General of the United Nations.
sentences.chinese: 這是我擔任聯合國祕書長兩年多來的第三次訪問。

sentences.english: I have visited many blogs of Sina lately, and my blog had some visitors.
sentences.chinese: 近來訪問了很多新浪博客，同時也得到一些博友來訪。

sentences.english: "I haven't decided yet" which country to visit first.
sentences.chinese: “我尚未確定”哪國將首先訪問。

sentences.english: The cylindrical container has a wide -mouth opening for easy filling and convenient access to the contents.
sentences.chinese: 圓柱容器廣泛張口，方便灌裝和方便地訪問內容。

sentences.english: The chairman is in Holland on business.
sentences.chinese: 董事長因公在荷蘭訪問。

sentences.english: Which areas of the site are they visiting before they make a purchase?
sentences.chinese: 他們在做出購買之前訪問了站點的哪些區域？

sentences.english: Chinese State Councilor Ma Kai has recently concluded his visit to the EU headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 不久前，馬凱國務委員成功訪問歐盟總部。

definition: to interview/to gather news/to hunt for and collect/to cover
to interview (a particular person or on a particular topic)/special interview/special report based on such an interview
to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate
to inform/to report/to make known/report/speech/talk/lecture/CL:篇[pian1],份[fen4],個|个[ge4],通[tong4]
investigation/inquiry/to investigate/to survey/survey/(opinion) poll/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
to give an interview/to be interviewed/to respond to (questions, a survey etc)
